title: frame rate problems
body: hi guys i have the following laptop: Toshiba Core i7 6th Generation 6500U 8GB DDR3 1TB 15.6 HD DVDRW Nvidia Geforce 930M 2GB dedicated Graphics, on which the game should work perfectly however in game i am facing a problem where the fps keeps on fluctuating between 170 and 15 making it impossible to play. i would appreciate any help guys on how i can solve this issue.

replies.body:
It's possible you're affected by the issue going on with the *Game DVR* feature in the Windows Game Bar. I recommend [disabling this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this issue.

Let me know if it did.
thank you, it is better but still not 100% solved. the fps change still occurs but it is less frequent

Gotcha. I'm glad it's at least a bit better. I suggest checking out our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for a few more steps that may resolve this.

Let me know if they helped.
